DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The function being assigned or passed should be a IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE <FunctionName>;' before the current first declaration of <FunctionName>.
The function being assigned or passed should be a IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE <FunctionName>;' before the current first declaration of <FunctionName>.

The function being assigned or passed should be a IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE SyncCompletionRoutine;' before the current first declaration of SyncCompletionRoutine.

The function being assigned or passed should be a REQUEST_POWER_COMPLETE function: Add the declaration 'REQUEST_POWER_COMPLETE SendDeviceSetPowerComplete;' before the current first declaration of SendDeviceSetPowerComplete.

The function being assigned or passed should be a IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE function: Add the declaration 'IO_COMPLETION_ROUTINE SelectiveSuspendCompletionRoutine;' before the current first declaration of SelectiveSuspendCompletionRoutine.
